titles.title: A bill to authorize an exchange of properties between the United States and Tuskegee University relating to the Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site, Alabama, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 4/12/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey property known as Grey Columns to the Tuskegee University, Alabama, if specified conditions are met. Authorizes the Secretary to accept an easement from the University for the administration of the Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site.
